app.title: SAG Calculator
app.subtitle: Accurately estimate the sag of your slackline.
input.tension.label: Slackline Tension (T)
input.length.label: Slackline Length (L)
input.mass.label: Person's Mass (W)
input.mainLineWeight.label: Main Line Weight
input.backupLineLength.label: Backup Line Length
input.backupLineWeight.label: Backup Line Weight
input.anchorHeight.label: Anchor Height (H\u2090)
input.elasticity.label: Max Slackline Elasticity
results.title: Result
results.elasticityDetails.title: Elasticity Details:
results.error.tensionNegative: Tension must be a non-negative number.
results.error.lengthNegative: Length must be a non-negative number.
results.error.massNegative: Person's mass must be a non-negative number.
results.error.mainLineWeightNegative: Main line weight per meter must be a non-negative number.
results.error.backupLineLengthNegative: Backup line length must be a non-negative number.
results.error.backupLineWeightNegative: Backup line weight per meter must be a non-negative number.
results.error.anchorHeightPositive: Anchor height must be a positive number.
results.error.elasticityNegative: Slackline elasticity must be a non-negative number.
results.error.lengthZeroWithMass: Error: Slackline length cannot be zero if there is effective mass (person or lines).
results.error.infiniteSagTheoretical: Tension ({tension} N) equals Effective_W/2 ({wHalf} N). Theoretically, SAG would be infinite (slackline would be vertical).
results.error.tensionTooLow: Error: Tension ({tension} N) is too low (less than Effective_W/2 = {wHalf} N) to support the weight. No real solution for SAG.
visualizer.errorInputMessage: Invalid input or non-physical setup. Please check values.
visualizer.ariaLabel: Visualization of the slackline and its SAG
footer.copyright: © {year} Slackline SAG Calculator. Based on physics principles.
langSwitcher.label: Language:
